He predicted that in Tuesday's State of the Union address, Americans will want to hear how Barack Obama is going to bring down the unemployment rate and fix the economy even more than he's fixed it already. Colin Powell said Barack Obama had increased favorability ratings for the U.S. around the world and that the president's "more youthful approach" to international relations had proven "useful."
